verses.verse: מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Oh יִתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> Oh that רֹאשִׁי֙ <S%H7218><s%> my head מַ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> were waters וְעֵינִ֖י <S%H5869><s%> and mine eyes מְק֣וֹר <S%H4726><s%> a fountain דִּמְעָ֑ה <S%H1832><s%> of tears וְאֶבְכֶּה֙ <S%H1058><s%> that I might weep יוֹמָ֣ם <S%H3119><s%> day וָלַ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> and night אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> חַֽלְלֵ֥י <S%H2491><s%> for the slain בַת־ <S%H1323><s%> of the daughter עַמִּֽי׃ <S%H5971><s%> of my people

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Oh יִתְּנֵ֣נִי <S%H5414><s%> Oh that בַמִּדְבָּ֗ר <S%H4057><s%> I had in the wilderness מְלוֹן֙ <S%H4411><s%> a lodging place אֹֽרְחִ֔ים <S%H732><s%> of wayfaring men וְאֶֽעֶזְבָה֙ <S%H5800><s%> that I might leave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> my people וְאֵלְכָ֖ה <S%H1980><s%> and go מֵֽאִתָּ֑ם <S%H853><s%> כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> them כֻלָּם֙ <S%H3605><s%> for all מְנָ֣אֲפִ֔ים <S%H5003><s%> from them for they [be] all adulterers עֲצֶ֖רֶת <S%H6116><s%> an assembly בֹּגְדִֽים׃ <S%H898><s%> of treacherous men

וַֽיַּדְרְכ֤וּ <S%H1869><s%> And they bend אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לְשׁוֹנָם֙ <S%H3956><s%> their tongues קַשְׁתָּ֣ם <S%H7198><s%> [like] their bow שֶׁ֔קֶר <S%H8267><s%> [for] lies וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and not לֶאֱמוּנָ֖ה <S%H530><s%> for the truth גָּבְר֣וּ <S%H1396><s%> but they are not valiant בָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the earth כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> from מֵרָעָ֨ה <S%H7451><s%> from evil אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to רָעָ֧ה ׀ <S%H7451><s%> to evil יָצָ֛אוּ <S%H3318><s%> for they proceed וְאֹתִ֥י <S%H853><s%> לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָדָ֖עוּ <S%H3045><s%> and they know נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> not me saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס

אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one מֵרֵעֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H7453><s%> of his neighbour הִשָּׁמֵ֔רוּ <S%H8104><s%> Take ye heed וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any אָ֖ח <S%H251><s%> ye not in any brother אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּבְטָ֑חוּ <S%H982><s%> and trust כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> Because כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every אָח֙ <S%H251><s%> for every brother עָק֣וֹב <S%H6117><s%> will utterly יַעְקֹ֔ב <S%H6117><s%> supplant וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every רֵ֖עַ <S%H7453><s%> and every neighbour רָכִ֥יל <S%H7400><s%> with slanders יַהֲלֹֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> will walk

וְאִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one בְּרֵעֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H7453><s%> his neighbour יְהָתֵ֔לּוּ <S%H2048><s%> And they will deceive וֶאֱמֶ֖ת <S%H571><s%> the truth לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and does not יְדַבֵּ֑רוּ <S%H1696><s%> and will not speak לִמְּד֧וּ <S%H3925><s%> they have taught לְשׁוֹנָ֛ם <S%H3956><s%> their tongue דַּבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> to speak שֶׁ֖קֶר <S%H8267><s%> lies הַעֲוֵ֥ה <S%H5753><s%> themselves to commit iniquity נִלְאֽוּ׃ <S%H3811><s%> [and] weary

שִׁבְתְּךָ֖ <S%H3427><s%> Thine habitation בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> [is] in the midst מִרְמָ֑ה <S%H4820><s%> of deceit בְּמִרְמָ֛ה <S%H4820><s%> through deceit מֵאֲנ֥וּ <S%H3985><s%> they refuse דַֽעַת־ <S%H3045><s%> to know אוֹתִ֖י <S%H853><s%> נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> me saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts הִנְנִ֥י <S%H2005><s%> behold צוֹרְפָ֖ם <S%H6884><s%> Behold I will melt וּבְחַנְתִּ֑ים <S%H974><s%> them and try כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For אֵ֣יךְ <S%H349><s%> what אֶעֱשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> them for how shall I do מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> for בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter עַמִּֽי׃ <S%H5971><s%> folk

חֵ֥ץ <S%H2671><s%> [is as] an arrow [שֹׁוחֵט כ] (שָׁח֛וּט <S%H7819><s%> kill ק) לְשׁוֹנָ֖ם <S%H3956><s%> Their tongue מִרְמָ֣ה <S%H4820><s%> deceit דִבֵּ֑ר <S%H1696><s%> it speaketh בְּפִ֗יו <S%H6310><s%> with his mouth שָׁל֤וֹם <S%H7965><s%> peaceably אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for רֵעֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H7453><s%> to his neighbour יְדַבֵּ֔ר <S%H1696><s%> [one] speaketh וּבְקִרְבּ֖וֹ <S%H7130><s%> but in heart יָשִׂ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> he layeth אָרְבּֽוֹ׃ <S%H696><s%> his wait

הַעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for אֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אֶפְקָד־ <S%H6485><s%> Shall I not visit בָּ֖ם נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> them for these [things]? saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אִ֚ם <S%H518><s%> On בְּג֣וֹי <S%H1471><s%> on such a nation אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> such כָּזֶ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תִתְנַקֵּ֖ם <S%H5358><s%> be avenged נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> shall not my soul ס

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> For הֶ֨הָרִ֜ים <S%H2022><s%> For the mountains אֶשָּׂ֧א <S%H5375><s%> will I take up בְכִ֣י <S%H1065><s%> a weeping וָנֶ֗הִי <S%H5092><s%> and wailing וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and for נְא֤וֹת <S%H4999><s%> and for the habitations מִדְבָּר֙ <S%H4057><s%> of the wilderness קִינָ֔ה <S%H7015><s%> a lamentation כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> Because נִצְּתוּ֙ <S%H3341><s%> because they are burned up מִבְּלִי־ <S%H1097><s%> no אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> so that none עֹבֵ֔ר <S%H5674><s%> can pass וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> is not שָׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> through [them] neither can [men] hear ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice מִקְנֶ֑ה <S%H4735><s%> of the cattle מֵע֤וֹף <S%H5775><s%> both the fowl הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> of the heavens וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against בְּהֵמָ֔ה <S%H929><s%> and the beast נָדְד֖וּ <S%H5074><s%> are fled הָלָֽכוּ׃ <S%H1980><s%> they are gone

וְנָתַתִּ֧י <S%H5414><s%> And I will make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem לְגַלִּ֖ים <S%H1530><s%> heaps מְע֣וֹן <S%H4583><s%> [and] a den תַּנִּ֑ים <S%H8577><s%> of dragons וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עָרֵ֧י <S%H5892><s%> the cities יְהוּדָ֛ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אֶתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> and I will make שְׁמָמָ֖ה <S%H8077><s%> desolate מִבְּלִ֖י <S%H1097><s%> without יוֹשֵֽׁב׃ <S%H3427><s%> without an inhabitant ס

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who הָאִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man הֶֽחָכָם֙ <S%H2450><s%> Who [is] the wise וְיָבֵ֣ן <S%H995><s%> that may understand אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זֹ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֧ר <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken פִּֽי־ <S%H6310><s%> this? and [who is he] to whom the mouth יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> about וְיַגִּדָ֑הּ <S%H5046><s%> that he may declare עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and מָה֙ <S%H4100><s%> how long אָבְדָ֣ה <S%H6><s%> perisheth הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> it for what the land נִצְּתָ֥ה <S%H3341><s%> [and] is burned up כַמִּדְבָּ֖ר <S%H4057><s%> like a wilderness מִבְּלִ֖י <S%H1097><s%> no עֹבֵֽר׃ <S%H5674><s%> that none passeth through ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Because עָזְבָם֙ <S%H5800><s%> Because they have forsaken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תּ֣וֹרָתִ֔י <S%H8451><s%> my law אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֖תִּי <S%H5414><s%> which I set לִפְנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> before וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor שָׁמְע֥וּ <S%H8085><s%> them and have not obeyed בְקוֹלִ֖י <S%H6963><s%> my voice וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor הָ֥לְכוּ <S%H1980><s%> neither walked בָֽהּ׃

וַיֵּ֣לְכ֔וּ <S%H1980><s%> have walked אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> after שְׁרִר֣וּת <S%H8307><s%> the imagination לִבָּ֑ם <S%H3820><s%> of their own heart וְאַחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> and after הַבְּעָלִ֔ים <S%H1168><s%> Baalim אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after לִמְּד֖וּם <S%H3925><s%> taught אֲבוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> which their fathers ס

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> therefore כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הִנְנִ֧י <S%H2005><s%> behold מַאֲכִילָ֛ם <S%H398><s%> Behold I will feed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> them [even] this people הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this לַֽעֲנָ֑ה <S%H3939><s%> with wormwood וְהִשְׁקִיתִ֖ים <S%H8248><s%> to drink מֵי־ <S%H4325><s%> and give them water רֹֽאשׁ׃ <S%H7219><s%> of gall

וַהֲפִֽצוֹתִים֙ <S%H6327><s%> I will scatter בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> them also among the heathen אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> whom לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> neither יָֽדְע֔וּ <S%H3045><s%> have known הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like וַֽאֲבוֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> whom neither they nor their fathers וְשִׁלַּחְתִּ֤י <S%H7971><s%> and I will send אַֽחֲרֵיהֶם֙ <S%H310><s%> after אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> a sword עַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> until כַּלּוֹתִ֖י <S%H3615><s%> them till I have consumed אוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%> פ

כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts הִתְבּֽוֹנְנ֛וּ <S%H995><s%> Consider וְקִרְא֥וּ <S%H7121><s%> ye and call לַמְקוֹנְנ֖וֹת <S%H6969><s%> for the mourning women וּתְבוֹאֶ֑ינָה <S%H935><s%> that they may come וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> for הַחֲכָמ֥וֹת <S%H2450><s%> for cunning שִׁלְח֖וּ <S%H7971><s%> and send וְתָבֽוֹאנָה׃ <S%H935><s%> [women] that they may come

וּתְמַהֵ֕רְנָה <S%H4116><s%> And let them make haste וְתִשֶּׂ֥נָה <S%H5375><s%> and take up עָלֵ֖ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> up נֶ֑הִי <S%H5092><s%> a wailing וְתֵרַ֤דְנָה <S%H3381><s%> may run down עֵינֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H5869><s%> for us that our eyes דִּמְעָ֔ה <S%H1832><s%> with tears וְעַפְעַפֵּ֖ינוּ <S%H6079><s%> and our eyelids יִזְּלוּ־ <S%H5140><s%> gush out מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> with waters

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> Because ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> For a voice נְהִ֛י <S%H5092><s%> of wailing נִשְׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> is heard מִצִּיּ֖וֹן <S%H6726><s%> out of Zion אֵ֣יךְ <S%H349><s%> How שֻׁדָּ֑דְנוּ <S%H7703><s%> How are we spoiled בֹּ֤שְׁנֽוּ <S%H954><s%> confounded מְאֹד֙ <S%H3966><s%> we are greatly כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because עָזַ֣בְנוּ <S%H5800><s%> because we have forsaken אָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> Because הִשְׁלִ֖יכוּ <S%H7993><s%> have cast [us] out מִשְׁכְּנוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H4908><s%> because our dwellings ס

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Now שְׁמַ֤עְנָה <S%H8085><s%> Yet hear נָשִׁים֙ <S%H802><s%> O ye women דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> the word יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְתִקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> receive אָזְנְכֶ֖ם <S%H241><s%> and let your ear דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> the word פִּ֑יו <S%H6310><s%> of his mouth וְלַמֵּ֤דְנָה <S%H3925><s%> and teach בְנֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H1323><s%> your daughters נֶ֔הִי <S%H5092><s%> wailing וְאִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H802><s%> and every one רְעוּתָ֖הּ <S%H7468><s%> her neighbour קִינָֽה׃ <S%H7015><s%> lamentation
